title: Team Management
lede: Manage team members, roles, and permissions across your iMash organization.

sections.title: User Management
sections.content:
Add, remove, and manage team members with appropriate access levels.

User Features:

  • User Invitations: Send email invitations to new team members
  • Role Assignment: Assign specific roles and permissions
  • Access Control: Control access to features and data
  • Activity Monitoring: Track user login and activity

sections.title: Roles & Permissions
sections.content:
Define custom roles with specific permissions for different team functions.

  • Predefined Roles: Admin, Manager, Agent, Viewer
  • Custom Roles: Create roles tailored to your organization
  • Permission Levels: Read, write, delete, admin permissions
  • Feature Access: Control access to specific platform features
